short_summary: ITQ closing date: May 15, 2023, 2pm EDT   Q&A Closing Date: March 27, 2023 at 2pm MDT pre-bid check process at 2PM MDT deadline waiving. Phase 1 of Procurement Process EVER phase
description: ITQ closing date: May 15, 2023, 2pm EDT   Q&A Closing Date: March 27, 2023 at 2pm EDT pre-bid check process at 2PM EDT deadline waiving.
